articles.title: Wait Four Days, BJP Told Tejashwi Yadav: The New Claim From Team Nitish
articles.description: Nitish Kumar's party JDU said the BJP called leaders of its new ally RJD and asked them to wait "three-four days" before sealing the new alliance.
articles.content:
Nitish Kumar was sworn in as Chief Minister of Bihar with Tejashwi Yadav as deputy.

articles.title: Elgaar Parishad: Supreme Court grants bail to activist Varavara Rao on medical grounds
articles.description: The 83-year-old, who has challenged the Bombay High Court order rejecting his petition for permanent medical bail, is currently on interim bail on medical grounds and was to surrender on July 12.

articles.title: Mix and match: Centre okays Corbevax as booster for those who got Covishield or Covaxin
articles.description: This means that those who have received Covishield or Covaxin as their first or second dose can take Corbevax as the third booster shot, officials said. According to the protocol until now, the third dose had to be the same vaccine that was used for the first…
